description: This header file declares exported functions for the TLS Hso Server object, including creation, removal, enrollment of objects, and initialization, in the context of Transport Layer Security implementation.

methods.name: TlsCreateHsoServer
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Hso Server object with provided context handles.

methods.name: TlsHsoServerCreate
methods.description: Allocates and initializes a new Hso Server object with the given context handles.

methods.name: TlsHsoServerRemove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified Hso Server object.

methods.name: TlsHsoServerEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary objects within the server context.

methods.name: TlsHsoServerInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the Hso Server object, setting up its state and resources.
